content.rendered:
Friday, April 4th   – Today is a C Day

  • Bagpiping Club will meet on Monday after dismissal 
  • There will be NO KNITTING CLUB on Monday- see Mrs. Levin if you need any supplies before vacation. 
  • We’re back again this morning to serve up some Bucks by the Boatload. Teachers, please have your LiveSchool accounts ready! Today we will award 25 Blue Streak Bucks to each student who does not have their cell phone on them. Remember, cell phones should be in your backpack, locker, or left at home. Students – keep following the 4 B’s to earn more Bucks by the Boatload! 

*Fridays lunch is…. PIZZA, garden salad, strawberry applesauce AND cherry/blue raspberry Ice. 

Check out the Maple Avenue Club Calendar for club meetings and room information!

As always, BE SAFE, BE RESPECTFUL, BE RESPONSIBLE, BE KIND!  

Make it a great day, or not…the choice is yours.
